channel.title: Creating And Need Suggestions
channel.description: Ok people! Im working on a source at the moment. I need to know what you the public like in servers..And what types of shops i should add..Any special skills or places other than the base of rs... So let me know what you like in servers ill do my best to add it and let you all know when its done.. When this is done i will have a website and a 24/7 server of it. Thankyou all that participates in this. And if anyone would like to help me out on codeing just drop me a pm and ill be glad to see if your up to the job ....Thankyou all! :cool:

item.title: Creating And Need Suggestions
item.dc:creator: @3rd_Hokage 3rd Hokage
item.description:
@3rd_Hokage wrote:

  1. Own client + Stuff
  2. Edgeville (Populair)
  3. Make a Food shop/Rune shop/Skillcape shop etc.
  4. Try to make custom mini-games.

Read full topic
